roleset.name: not-quite lie to
roleset.note: MISLEAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mislead' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from mislead.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pants on fire
example.text: The ruling stems from a 1984 suit filed by shareholders of Apple Computer Inc., claiming that company officials misled investors about the expected success of the Lisa computer, introduced in 1983.
example.arg: about the expected success of the Lisa computer, introduced in 1983

roleset.name: impelled action
roleset.note: MISLEAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mislead' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from mislead.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: lead me not into tempation
example.text: Last March, this newspaper reported on widespread allegations that the company misled many customers into purchasing more credit-data services than needed.
example.arg: into purchasing more credit-data services than needed
